external_references.description: Abdo, B., et al. (2022, April 4). FIN7 Power Hour: Adversary Archaeology and the Evolution of FIN7. Retrieved April 5, 2022.
Carr, N., et al. (2017, April 24). FIN7 Evolution and the Phishing LNK. Retrieved April 24, 2017.
Department of Justice. (2018, August 01). HOW FIN7 ATTACKED AND STOLE DATA. Retrieved August 24, 2018.
Gemini Advisory. (2022, January 13). FIN7 Uses Flash Drives to Spread Remote Access Trojan. Retrieved May 14, 2025.

objects.description: [FIN7](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0046) has downloaded additional malware to execute on the victim's machine, including by using a PowerShell script to launch shellcode that retrieves an additional payload.(Citation: FireEye FIN7 April 2017)(Citation: DOJ FIN7 Aug 2018)(Citation: Mandiant FIN7 Apr 2022)(Citation: Gemini_FIN7_Jan2022)
